snippet: The courts must be very cautious about extending the individual right to own a gun.
abstract: Editorial examines implications of Supreme Court's 2008 controversial ruling that struck down District of Columbia's ban on handguns; contends text of the Second Amendment creates no rights to private possession of guns; warns courts must be very cautious about extending individual right to own a gun.
lead_paragraph: The courts must be very cautious about extending the individual right to own a gun.

headline.print_headline: Personal Guns and the Second Amendment
headline.main: Personal Guns and the Second Amendment
